summary: A blind man's master told him that after he has broken 1000 strings on his Banjo, he can open the Banjo to get a script for his eyes. After 60 years he broke the 1000th string...
cast: Zhongyuan Liu|Lei Huang|Qing Xu|Ling Ma|Erga Yao|Jinzhan Zhang|Zhengyuan Zhang|Ling Zhong
title: Bian zou bian chang
